class.description: Model Predictive Path Integral (MPPI) controller plugin for nav2. Vanilla MPPI implementation using sampling-based optimization with Gaussian noise. Supports differential drive robots with trajectory tracking and obstacle avoidance.
Log-MPPI controller plugin for nav2. Log-space weight computation variant of MPPI for improved numerical stability. Serves as a base for importance sampling extensions.
Tsallis-MPPI controller plugin for nav2. q-exponential weight computation for exploration/exploitation balance control. q>1: heavy-tail (more exploration), q<1: light-tail (more exploitation).
Risk-Aware (CVaR) MPPI controller plugin for nav2. Conditional Value at Risk based weight truncation for conservative path planning. alpha<1: risk-averse (uses only best alpha fraction of samples).

Stein Variational MPC (SVMPC) controller plugin for nav2. SVGD kernel-based sample diversity for multi-modal distribution exploration. svgd_num_iterations=0: Vanilla equivalent, >0: SVGD loop enabled.
Smooth-MPPI controller plugin for nav2. Kim et al. (2021) delta-u input-lifting for structurally smooth control. Optimizes in delta-u space with cumsum restoration and jerk cost penalty.
Spline-MPPI controller plugin for nav2. ICRA 2024 B-spline basis interpolation from P knots to N timesteps. P knots (P << N) with de Boor recursive basis for smooth sampling.
SVG-MPPI (Stein Variational Guided MPPI) controller plugin for nav2. Kondo et al. ICRA 2024. G guide particles with SVGD + follower resampling. Efficient multi-modal exploration with G << K.
